trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If Harshnag fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Weighted Net
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, ranged 20/60 ft., one Small, Medium, or Large creature. {@h}The target is {@condition restrained} until it escapes the net. Any creature can use its action to make a {@dc 17} Strength check to free itself or another creature in the net, ending the effect on a success. Dealing 15 slashing damage to the net (AC 12) destroys the net and frees the target.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two greataxe attacks.

action.name: Gurt's Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d12 + 7}) slashing damage, or 39 ({@damage 5d12 + 7}) slashing damage if the target is human.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.
